DOE component block register type definition

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x80
Size:
0x4
Array Dimensions:
[8]
Array Stride:
+0x4
Total Size:
0x20

Description

4 32-bit registers storing the 128-bit padded input. These registers are located at DOE_base_address + 0x0000_0080 to 0x0000_008C in big-endian representation.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:0] BLOCK w 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

BLOCK

Input message block field
